description:
Early morning starts at the trailhead, heading out sightseeing, or to heading to your favourite bakery are all better when you’re comfy. With their lightweight, stretchy material the Quandary shorts will keep you comfy, wherever the day takes you.Recycled nylon, nylon and spandex fabric is tough and quick-drying, with a hint of stretch for mobility.Treated with a DWR finish to help your shorts stay looking great longer.Belt loops and an internal drawcord give you options to find that perfect fit.Plenty of pocket space with a rear zippered pocket let you keep small necessities close and safe.Crotch gusset and stretchy material mean these shorts move with you, no binding or bunching.Regular fit.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Quandary 7" Shorts - Women's
